title: Motion and time
brief_description: A study of our relation to time and motion. Depicts the changing concepts of our view of time, motion and space, from Copernicus to Einstein. Principles of Einstein’s theory of relativity are explained through an animated segment, demonstrating that measurements of both space and time are not absolute but are functions of motion.
